channel.title: actionTimer Compile Problem?

item.title: actionTimer Compile Problem?
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

  1. you haven’t declared the actionTimer int in that class
  2. the int is in another class which you aren’t calling

item.title: actionTimer Compile Problem?

item.description:

if(objectID == 4459){ sM("You steal 5k!"); actionTimer = 8; setAnimation(1978); addItem(995, 5000); addSkillXP((35*playerLevel[17]), 17); }

This is my error.

.\src\client.java:14444: cannot find symbol symbol : variable actionTimer location: class client actionTimer = 8; ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .
